title: Parking more than 50% over and above stipulated in table 8-B and 8-C, shall be liable for payment of charges at the rate of 10% of land rate mentioned in the ASR without taking into account guidelines therein
clause_text: Parking more than 50% over and above stipulated in table 8-B and 8-C, shall be liable for payment of charges at the rate of 10% of land rate mentioned in the ASR without taking into account guidelines therein. Such charges shall be recovered on the area covered under car / scooter parking over and above the requirement. However, for public semi-public, hotel, hospital, educational buildings, such charges shall not be leviable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
